MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL59 postcode area of Menai Bridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.40pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:39PM on 16th January 2021.
